sourcesContent: import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {TaskService} from "../../../core/services/task.service"; import {Task} from "../../../core/models/task.model"; @Component({ selector: 'app-task-list', templateUrl: './task-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-list.component.scss'] }) export class TaskListComponent { public tasks!: Task[]; @Input() finished!: boolean; constructor(private taskService : TaskService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.tasks = this.taskService.getAllTasks(); } }
